data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tachi, Takuji, Huang, Yu-Zen (2019): A new species of Medinodexia Townsend (Diptera: Tachinidae) from Japan, with a discussion on phylogenetic implications of the female postabdomen in Blondeliini. Zootaxa 4638 (4): 584-594, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4638.4.8|24 occurrences
